E

Escape - Class in com.coverity.security
Escape is a small set of methods for escaping tainted data.
Escape() - Constructor for class com.coverity.security.Escape
 
EscapeEL - Class in com.coverity.security
EscapeEL is a wrapper class the provides alternative names for the escaping methods in com.coverity.security.Escape.
EscapeEL() - Constructor for class com.coverity.security.EscapeEL
